title: SafuBTC
author: SafuBTC
content: What's your best pool for flux mining thats very accurate in result?also how many flux can i earn with 3070ti per day?

comments.author: Z390
comments.body: Any pool would do, but I still recommend mining ETH and using that to buy Flux because you will get more Flux coin this way every 24 hours, Flux isn't profitable to mine right now.

comments.author: Coinfarm ventures
comments.body: Your RTX 3070 Ti card has better profit on ETH, so I recommend mining ETH then trading it to buy FLUX. The only models that are good for FLUX or other Equihash variants are the GTX 1000 series or RTX 2000/super series. The RTX 3060 Ti is OK.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: FLUX coin will have a new mining option added, announcement in 8 daysIn less than 8 days mining will be changed forever. PoUW project Mayhem and much more will be announced at MiningDisrupt in Miami. You will also see a working PoUW mining rig! Shits about to get real.https://www.reddit.com/r/Flux_Official/comments/152xsb4/in_less_than_8_days_mining_will_be_changed/

comments.author: safar1980
comments.body: Proof Of Useful Work! Maybe it's a good idea to make the work of the miners useful. In this mining mode, video cards will be able to perform rendering or cloud gaming tasks and earn extra money. But not every mining farm is suitable for such mining in terms of characteristics.
